A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Was this a perfect movie? No. 


However\, this is the Star Wars movie that we needed. If we are going to receive a new Star Wars movie every single year\, then we are going to need to be able to accept change and subversion. 

I found this film to be extremely entertaining. I liked how it simultaneously supported the morality of the war between Light and Dark while also showing that this eternal conflict is exploited and/or avoided by the larger universe. 


This is a movie which takes risks and slaughters sacred cows. Unlike TFA\, I was never quite sure what to expect. I guess\, above all else\, that is what I appreciated the most. Unlike TFA - I didn't guess the entire plot before the opening crawl.
